entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Alma
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:21 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mistook 09:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: ESE 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 09:19 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 09:19 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
